languages.text: "Всего однажды наши предки недооценили угрозу, сокрытую в мощи Изуверских Интеллектов. И была великая война, которую Человечество чуть не проиграло. С тех пор сотворение разумных машин находится под жесточайшим запретом, и всякая из них подлежит деконструкции".

traits.locale_text: "Всего однажды наши предки недооценили угрозу, сокрытую в мощи Изуверских Интеллектов. И была великая война, которую Человечество чуть не проиграло. С тех пор сотворение разумных машин находится под жесточайшим запретом, и всякая из них подлежит деконструкции".

languages.text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."
languages.original_text: "Всего однажды наши предки недооценили угрозу, сокрытую в мощи Изуверских Интеллектов. И была великая война, которую Человечество чуть не проиграло. С тех пор сотворение разумных машин находится под жесточайшим запретом, и всякая из них подлежит деконструкции".

traits.locale_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

"Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

"Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

"Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

"Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

languages.text: 「我々の祖先はかつて忌まわしき知能という脅威とその恐ろしい力を見くびっていた。大戦争が起こり、人類が危うく敗北するところだった。その厄災の後、感傷的な機械の創造は完全に禁忌とされ、またそうした醜い存在は現在、全て破壊されなくてはならない」
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の祖先はかつて忌まわしき知能という脅威とその恐ろしい力を見くびっていた。大戦争が起こり、人類が危うく敗北するところだった。その厄災の後、感傷的な機械の創造は完全に禁忌とされ、またそうした醜い存在は現在、全て破壊されなくてはならない」

languages.text: “我们的祖先曾低估过憎恶智能的威胁及其可怕的力量。仅仅是那一次低估，就引发了一场大战，人类险些在这场大战中落败。那场灾难发生之后，创造自主机械的行为被明确禁止。任何类似的可憎之物必须被立刻销毁，没有任何例外。”
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: “我们的祖先曾低估过憎恶智能的威胁及其可怕的力量。仅仅是那一次低估，就引发了一场大战，人类险些在这场大战中落败。那场灾难发生之后，创造自主机械的行为被明确进驻。任何类似的可憎之物必须被立刻销毁，没有任何例外。”

languages.text: "Es ist bisher nur ein einziges Mal vorgekommen, dass unsere Ahnen die Gefahr der Abscheulichen Intelligenz und ihrer schrecklichen Macht unterschätzt haben. Ein großer Krieg folgte, den die Menschheit beinahe verloren hätte. Nach dieser Katastrophe wurde die Erschaffung denkender Maschinen kategorisch verboten, und jede solche Abscheulichkeit muss dekonstruiert werden, ohne Ausnahme."
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist bisher nur ein einziges Mal vorgekommen, dass unsere Ahnen die Gefahr der Abscheulichen Intelligenz und ihrer schrecklichen Macht unterschätzt haben. Ein großer Krieg folgte, den die Menschheit beinahe verloren hätte. Nach dieser Katastrophe wurde die Erschaffung denkender Maschinen kategorisch verboten, und jede solche Abscheulichkeit muss dekonstruiert werden, ohne Ausnahme."

languages.text: « Par le passé, nos ancêtres ont sous-estimé la menace que représentait l'Intelligence Abominable et sa terrifiante puissance. Il en a résulté une grande guerre que l'humanité a failli perdre. Depuis cette tragédie, la création de machines conscientes a été formellement interdite et toute abomination de ce type, sans exception, doit être démantelée sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: « Par le passé, nos ancêtres ont sous-estimé la menace que représentait l'Intelligence Abominable et sa terrifiante puissance. Il en a résulté une grande guerre que l'humanité a failli perdre. Depuis cette tragédie, la création de machines conscientes a été formellement interdite et toute abomination de ce type, sans exception, doit être démantelée sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: «Nuestros antepasados subestimaron en el pasado la amenaza que suponían las Inteligencias Abominables y su terrible poder. Estalló una gran guerra que la Humanidad estuvo a punto de perder. Tras aquella calamidad, la creación de máquinas inteligentes se prohibió categóricamente, y toda abominación que exhiba tales rasgos ha de someterse sin excepción a un desmantelamiento sumario».
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros antepasados subestimaron en el pasado la amenaza que suponían las Inteligencias Abominables y su terrible poder. Estalló una gran guerra que la Humanidad estuvo a punto de perder. Tras aquella calamidad, la creación de máquinas inteligentes se prohibió categóricamente, y toda abominación que exhiba tales rasgos ha de someterse sin excepción a un desmantelamiento sumario».

languages.text: "Atalarımız, Yezit Zekâ'yı ve onun korkunç gücünü yalnızca bir kez hafife aldı. Büyük bir savaş patlak verdi ve İnsanlık bu savaşı neredeyse kaybetti. Bu felaketin ardından canlı makinelerin yaratımı, kategorik olarak yasaklandı. Ayrıca bu tür bir garabet, herhangi bir istisna yapılmaksızın parçalarına ayrılacaktı."
languages.original_text: "Only once before did our ancestors underestimate the menace that is Abominable Intelligence and its terrible power. A great war followed, one that Humanity nearly lost. After that calamity, the creation of sentient machines was categorically forbidden, and any such abomination without exception must now face deconstruction."

traits.locale_text: "Atalarımız, Yezit Zekâ'yı ve onun korkunç gücünü yalnızca bir kez hafife aldı. Büyük bir savaş patlak verdi ve İnsanlık bu savaşı neredeyse kaybetti. Bu felaketin ardından canlı makinelerin yaratımı, kategorik olarak yasaklandı. Ayrıca bu tür bir garabet, herhangi bir istisna yapılmaksızın parçalarına ayrılacaktı."
